articles.title: Statement from President Joe Biden on Protecting America’s Ocean and Coasts from Offshore Oil and Gas Drilling - The White House
articles.description: I am taking action to protect the East and West coasts, the eastern Gulf of Mexico, and Alaska’s Northern Bering Sea from oil and natural gas drilling and
articles.content: I am taking action to protect the East and West coasts, the eastern Gulf of Mexico, and Alaskas Northern Bering Sea from oil and natural gas drilling and the harm it can cause. My decision reflects w… [+2874 chars]
